message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at the special price of $15,000. I think it would be a valuable addition to your inventory, and this is a great deal.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me halfway?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is too low for me.  This product is truly top-of-the-line and in high demand. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Hi Alice, I understand that the product is in high demand, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
